organization.description: The Federal Laboratory Consortium for Technology Transfer (FLC) is the nationwide network of federal laboratories that provides the forum to develop strategies and opportunities for linking laboratory mission technologies and expertise with the marketplace.
organization.title: Federal Laboratory Consortium
organization.name: federal-laboratory-consortium

name: security-and-emergency-management-division
notes: Volpe&#39;s Security and Emergency Management Division identifies vulnerabilities, risks, and opportunities to improve the security of transportation systems, critical infrastructures, and government facilities. Our team tests, evaluates, and implements innovative solutions using a systems approach, which can include policy, procedures, training, and technologies integrated to improve the safety and security of all transportation modes. By conducting training, exercises, seminars, and conferences with key stakeholders, we promote awareness of a wide spectrum of physical security, control systems security, cybersecurity, and operational management strategies and technologies. Our team examines approaches to and conducts emergency response and recovery operations, improving public safety during critical times of need.  Capabilities   Risk management and preparedness Evaluation and deployment of innovative security technologies Cyber and control system security research, development, and implementation for all transportation modes Emergency management strategy and program development to support response and recovery operations Strategic planning and systems architecture development to support the convergence of physical security and cybersecurity programs to meet reduced resource requirements Stakeholder outreach and communication Assessment and program development of emergency response and recovery plans and programs to improve an organization&#39;s overall resiliency - See more at: http://www.volpe.dot.gov/our-work/infrastructure-systems-and-technology/security-and-emergency-management#sthash.OEimIlel.dpuf
title: Security and Emergency Management Division
